tags.description: Represents a time period or specific date/time.
Represents a location, either general or specific.
Represents a person or group of people.
Represents a short-term or punctual action (instantaneous events).
Represents a long-term or continuous activity (extended duration).
Represents a scheduled or special event.
Represents a duration or time length.
